Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to extending the imposition of sales and compensating use taxes in the county of Jefferson
Summary: Relates to extending the 1% additional tax rate when calculating imposition of sales and compensating use taxes in the county of Jefferson to November 30, 2022.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the imposition of sales and compensating use taxes in the county of Jefferson
